response.original_title: Who were the Neanderthals? | DW Documentary
response.overview: Long before Homo sapiens populated the earth, the Neanderthals lived in Eurasia.  Now, paleoanthropologists in England and France are using new archeological methods to shed light on some previously unexplained Neanderthal mysteries.
response.tagline: Long before Homo sapiens populated the earth, the Neanderthals lived in Eurasia.
response.title: Who were the Neanderthals? | DW Documentary
